item.title: ðŸŽ‰ I started as a postdoctoral researcher at the GRASP Lab at UPenn.
item.description: I joined the GRASP Lab to work on the intersection of computer vision, robotics and machine learning. I am looking forward to collaborations and what the future brings!

item.title: ðŸ§ I successfully defended my Ph.D. with Summa Cum Laude!
item.description: I’d like to thanks everyone who has helped and supported me on this journey. A special thanks goes out to my supervisor Prof. Davide Scaramuzza, and my reviewers, Prof. Kostas Daniilidis, Prof. Andreas Geiger and Prof. Marc Pollefeys!
